post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Hi all.
As some of you know already, I'm doing my best to realize my dreams. But only one thing is lacked... yes money! ^^;
Currently, I'm in between jobs and I train myself systematically these days. Wow I didn't know that searching jobs is the most tough & difficult work. (at least for me) This is not because there're not many positions out there,
So, if you hear anything or know anyone that is related to 'Java developer-like' openings, please don't hesitate to let me know or require me to send my resume. I'd be pleased to be helped.
Thank you and have a wonderful life!
P.S. I will delete this when I am sure I have a new opp.
post.title: Looking for a new challenge
